headline: Show HN: Ex Platform for SWEs
description:
Hey guys, just sharing this project that I've been working on. Let me know what you think.

This idea came primarily from my own experience in the software industry. After a while, I was feeling discouraged by my job, mostly because I felt expendable (like a code monkey), burned out, and had unchallenging work. It felt like the employers I was working for didn’t have an idea of what was going on or how their employees were feeling. They would talk a lot about the technical challenges, but never did we talk about any mental/emotional challenges.

So I started thinking about what could be done to mitigate this problem and came up with this solution. An employee experience platform that tracks multiple psychological dimensions (specifically customized to track problems that can be faced in a software engineering environment) and gives the managers some insights into their teams/employees.

I'm still currently working on the MVP but would love to hear what you guys think about the idea and landing page. The MVP should be out in 2-3 weeks from now.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 社会福利机构的防爆平台
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 社會福利機構的防爆平臺
description_zh-Hans:
嘿，伙计们，只是分享一下我一直在做的这个项目。让我知道你的想法。

这个想法主要来自我自己在软件行业的经验。一段时间后，我对我的工作感到灰心丧气，主要是因为我觉得自己是可有可无的（像一只代码猴子），疲惫不堪，而且工作没有挑战性。我感觉我工作的雇主不知道发生了什么，也不知道他们的员工是如何感受的。他们会谈论很多技术上的挑战，但我们从来没有谈论过任何精神/情感上的挑战。

因此，我开始思考如何才能缓解这个问题，并想出了这个解决方案。一个员工体验平台，它可以跟踪多个心理维度（特别是为跟踪软件工程环境中可能面临的问题而定制），并让管理者对他们的团队/员工有一些了解。

我目前仍在开发MVP，但希望听到你们对这个想法和登陆页面的看法。MVP应该在2-3周后推出。
